comment: If all the preimages of right-open, unbounded below intervals, belong to a sigma-algebra, then all the preimages of right-closed, unbounded below intervals, belong to the sigma-algebra. (i) implies (ii) in Proposition 121B of [Fremlin1] p. 35. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
